description: Create a project transport plan assignment rule.

flags.name: --level-type
flags.validation: JSON:API type for the level relationship; server valid level types include Broker.

flags.name: --level-id
flags.validation: Must reference an existing level of the given level-type.

permissions: Allowed for users who are broker managers for the rule broker or who can update the related level via that level policy.
side_effects: Creates a project transport plan assignment rule record.
validation_notes: --rule, --asset-type, --level-type, and --level-id are required. asset-type must be one of driver, tractor, trailer. level-type must be a valid level type (server restricts to Broker). Broker is derived from level; broker must match the level broker.
